articles.author: Aishwarya Iyer, Esha Mitra, Heather Law
articles.title: At least 104 Indian citizens deported from US on military aircraft, say Indian officials - CNN
articles.description: At least 104 Indian citizens were deported from the United States Tuesday night on a military aircraft, according to officials from India’s Punjab state, as US President Donald Trump makes stemming migration a top priority.
